short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows split pace on NYRR results instead of cumulative average pace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to see your mile by mile lap pace vs total cumulative pace during your race.  This provides actual useful functionality vs a realtively useless avg pace visualization.
